name: Incompetent Henchmen Incorporated (Demo)
description:
Incompetent Henchmen Incorporated seems like a trustworthy company, at first glance. Fight the employees, defeat the CEO and end this companies rein of criminal activity!

This is a demo, I am working on the full release.
I estimate a year maximum.

This is just a basic FPS I wanted to make for my first game, I plan on adding more and making it a full game, as again this is just a demo.

UPDATE:Added resizing
